text: The er bloke in there said did I know who owned the  --
--I noticed there was this little long haired sort of black and white or grey dog that was er tethered to a oh a lamp post or something outside.
--the bloke had gone up to get his paper, tethered the dog outside and then walked off and forgotten the poor little thing.
Did he come back for it?
Well I presume so because it wasn't there when I came out.
But he said he thought it was an Irish fellow you know and I said well where does he live?
He said well I don't really know but I know he lives local somewhere.
